text:
@socialepfo @PIBHindi @PIB_India @MIB_India @MIB_Hindi @airnewsalerts @AIRNewsHindi @DDNewslive @PMOIndia @_DigitalIndia @DDNational Dear Sir,

But my claim still not settled till yet. so how can we trust on given statement.

I did earlier applied but it's pending since 17th March 2020 & now I did re-apply under Outbreak of Pandemic  ( Covid-19 ) on 1 April. 
But it's also under process. 
UAN 101011303473
